latestVersion.termsOfAccess:
Project files like raw data, coding guidelines and questionnaires can now be directly downloaded from this site.
Please see also SSD's Farm Household Survey Database (http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/).
latestVersion.dataAccessPlace: All files for this project/study, except for the Project Description, need to be directly downloaded from SSD's Farm Household Survey Database's online link: http://ricestat.irri.org/fhsd/

fields.value: Policy Oriented Research Impact Assessment (PORIA):  Economic Assessment of a Change in Chemical Registration Policy Due to IRRI Research on Pesticide Use and Philippine Farmers' Health

dsDescriptionValue.value: This is a follow-up survey on Rola & Pingali's 1989/90 pesticide health cost study. The survey documented changes in farmers' knowledge about, attitude towards, and practices in pesticide use.

keywordValue.value: Input-output, amount of pesticides (insecticides, herbicides, fungicides, rodenticides, molluscicides) used; practices and safety measures in pesticide application, use and disposal

fields.value: Subject: Number of Repondents  Type: Sample Size  Notes: 151; Subject: Wet  Type: Season  Notes: 2006; Subject: Dry  Type: Season  Notes: 2007;

value: Laguna, Quezon, and Nueva Ecija provinces
